name: DC Energy Resonance Open Source (EROS)
short_description:
What is EROS?
Energy Resonance Open Source is an energy related developer environment for Ozone-Friendly Solutions. These Developer Collaboration Sites (DC's) promote energy-based DC applications and extensions as a kernel for major operating systems
